title: Gorgeous veggie cake with cinnamon cream cheese icing
ingredients: ['2 large carrots, grated', '1 large parsnip, grated', '1 courgette, grated', '1 apple, grated', '150g plain flour', '70g wholemeal flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '3/4 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '3 large eggs', '150g caster sugar', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '125ml olive oil or other veg oil', 'Cinnamon cream cheese icing', '6 tablespoons cream cheese, room temperature', '75g butter, room temperature', '200g icing sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract']
